messages.text: Hi — I’m Stampley. I’m here to support you after your check-in.
To start: how stressful did diabetes feel today (0–10)?
Honestly a 7. I felt overwhelmed by meals and work.

That makes sense — balancing diabetes with work and meals can feel like a lot.

What part felt most difficult today: planning meals, the timing, or the mental stress?
The timing. I missed lunch and then ate late.

Thanks for sharing. Missing meals can throw everything off.

A small idea: choose one “backup snack” you can always keep in your bag (like nuts or a protein bar). Would that feel doable this week?
